name: MarketerHire
category: Specialized Talent Platform / Marketing / HR Tools
purpose: Specialized freelance marketplace for connecting businesses with pre-vetted top-tier marketing talent
description: MarketerHire is a dedicated platform launched in October 2018 for hiring high-quality marketing specialists. The platform features a rigorous vetting process including active talent scouting across Facebook groups, forums, and LinkedIn, professional experience review, skill-specific assessments, and video interviews to gauge communication skills and professionalism. Matching is fast (48 hours to ideal marketer). Covers wide range of marketing roles including content marketers, email marketers, growth marketers, paid search/social marketers, SEO specialists, and niche experts like Amazon/Shopify marketers, CMOs, and marketing interns. No upfront recruiting or contract fees; freelancers set their own rates ($80-$160/hour) with $1,500/month soft commitment.
cost_structure: No upfront fees; $80-$160/hour (freelancer-set rates); $1,500/month soft commitment; discounts for part-time/full-time
